body.first_text: Passionate about learning, improving, and growing.

card_info.my_description: Full stack developer with over 2 years of experience in both frontend and backend development. Certified as a Computer Programmer Analyst and currently pursuing a degree in Software Development Engineering.
card_info.skills_description: From SinglePage to applications with backend integration. Working with modern and scalable technologies to provide complete solutions that are easy to maintain and ready for real users.
card_info.ux_ui_description: Developing is not just writing code, it's creating experiences. Passionate about UI/UX design, I strive to create responsive, intuitive, and attractive interfaces that not only work well but also look good.
